items.headline: U.K. to drop demand for ‘back door’ into iPhones, as Apple reportedly expands Indian production
items.summary_en: The U.K. is acceding to U.S. government request to drop its demand for Apple to provide a so-called “back door” into the iPhone, as the company reportedly is expanding its production of the mobile phone in India.
